short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to email loads, highlight best loads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension helps dispatchers find the best loads to call or email for their truck.  It also simplifies dispatcher workflow by allowing "click to email" on truck loads.
